ForceLightning - Class in <Unnamed>
The ForceLightning class represents a lightning bolt projectile that can be fired by actor Palpatine The lightning bolt can be fired in three different directions and can cause different amounts of damage depending on its rotation, when is collised with actor Luke.
ForceLightning(int, int) - Constructor for class ForceLightning
Constructs a new ForceLightning object with a specified direction and rotation.

Indicates whether the Stormtrooper is ready to shoot.
respawn() - Method in class Stormtrooper
Resets the actor's life to 30, sets the isDead flag to false, sets the location to (position, 493), adds the actor to the world at the specified position and sets the image to the walk image.

Recursively respawns the Stormtrooper a specified number of times.
